item.title: Spotify、SiriusXM、その他のポッドキャスト会社は現在、プロのオーディオ・タレントに注目しており、Aリスト・セレブや大予算のオーディオ・ナラティブからシフトしている（Max Tani/Semafor）
item.description:
Max Tani / Semafor:
Spotify, SiriusXM, and other podcast companies are now focusing on professional audio talent, shifting from A-list celebrities and big-budget audio narratives  —  The News  —  CANNES — In 2020, Spotify's stock spiked on the news that Meghan Markle and Prince Harry signed an exclusive deal with the streaming platform.

item.title: 情報筋グループ・ブラックは、スポーツ・イラストレイテッド誌を発行し、ザ・ストリート誌など50以上の出版物を所有するアリーナ・グループの株式の過半数を買収する交渉中。
item.description:
Wall Street Journal:
Sources: Group Black is in talks to buy a majority stake in the Arena Group, which publishes Sports Illustrated and owns 50+ publications, including TheStreet  —  Black-owned media network has sought other acquisitions, though a deal hasn't materialized  —  Group Black is in talks to buy …

item.title: AIがウェブを殺す スパムサイト、「AIエディター」を大量生産する記事、モデレーターを疲弊させるEtsy、Reddit、WikipediaのAI生成ジャンクなど（James Vincent/The Verge）
item.description:
James Vincent / The Verge:
AI is killing the web with spam sites, mass article producing “AI editors”, AI-generated junk on Etsy, Reddit, and Wikipedia that exhausts moderators, and more  —  In recent months, the signs and portents have been accumulating with increasing speed.  Google is trying to kill the 10 blue links.

item.title: 分析：2023年5月と6月、141の主要ブランドが、AIが生成した記事を掲載する55の低品質サイトに、主にGoogle広告経由で広告を出稿し、中には1日あたり～1,200件の記事を掲載するサイトもあった（NewsGuard）。
item.description:
NewsGuard:
Analysis: in May and June 2023, 141 major brands ran ads, mostly via Google Ads, across 55 low-quality sites with AI-generated articles, some posting ~1,200/day  —  NewsGuard identified 141 brands that are feeding programmatic ad dollars to low-quality AI-generated news and information sites operating with little to no human oversight

item.title: 6月22日のツイートでNBAドラフトのベッティングラインが動いたことを受け、The Athleticのシャムス・チャラニア記者のFanDuelとの商業提携を疑問視する声も（Jared Diamond/Wall Street Journal）
item.description:
Jared Diamond / Wall Street Journal:
Some question The Athletic reporter Shams Charania's commercial partnership with FanDuel after his tweet on June 22 moved NBA draft betting lines  —  Shams Charania works for both sports news site the Athletic and gambling company FanDuel.  Things got complicated when he tweeted an NBA draft tip that turned out to be wrong.

item.title: Netflix、カナダで最も安い広告なしプラン「ベーシック」を新規契約者向けには廃止するも、既存契約者は引き続き月額9.99カナダドルのプランにアクセスできると発表（Stuart McGinn/Narcity）
item.description:
Stuart McGinn / Narcity:
Netflix drops Basic, its cheapest ad-free tier, in Canada for new customers but says existing subscribers can still access the CA$9.99/month plan  —  Streaming ad-free just got more expensive.  —  The Netflix sign-in page on a TV.  —  Netflix Canada seems to have quietly removed …

item.title: シネワールド社、リストラの一環として英国上場企業シネワールドplcの管財手続きを申請するも、営業は通常通り継続（Nancy Tartaglione/Deadline）
item.description:
Nancy Tartaglione / Deadline:
Cineworld files for the administration of its listed entity Cineworld plc in the UK as part of its restructuring, but will continue operating as normal  —  Cineworld said on Monday that as part of its proposed restructuring following Chapter 11, it expects to file for administration …

item.title: Fox Newsがゴールデンタイムを再編：ジェシー・ワターズはタッカー・カールソンの午後8時枠に、イングラハムは午後7時枠に、ハニティは午後9時枠に、グレッグ・グートフェルドは午後10時枠に（Colby Hall/Mediaite）
item.description:
Colby Hall / Mediaite:
Fox News reshuffles primetime: Jesse Watters takes Tucker Carlson's 8pm slot, Ingraham moves to 7pm, Hannity will stay at 9pm, and Greg Gutfeld moves to 10pm  —  Fox News announced the new prime time lineup it's putting in place in the wake of Tucker Carlson's shocking ouster earlier this year.

item.title: ヴォックス・メディア、広告事業を成長させつつコマースやサブスクリプションなど新たな収益源に注力するため経営陣を交代（Sara Fischer/Axios）
item.description:
Sara Fischer / Axios:
Vox Media makes changes to its executive team to focus on new revenue streams, including commerce and subscriptions, while growing its ad business  —  Vox Media, the digital media holding company whose titles include New York Magazine, Eater and The Verge, has appointed a slew of executives …

item.title: 米連邦準備制度理事会（SCOTUS）は、グーグルが何百万もの歌詞を検索用にスクレイピングしていると訴えるジーニアスの2019年の訴訟の復活を拒否し、訴訟を破棄する判決を残した（Emily Birnbaum/Bloomberg
item.description:
Emily Birnbaum / Bloomberg:
SCOTUS refuses to revive Genius' 2019 lawsuit accusing Google of scraping millions of song lyrics for search, leaving in place a ruling tossing out the lawsuit  —  The US Supreme Court refused to revive a lawsuit by music website Genius Media Group Inc. accusing Alphabet Inc.'s Google of stealing millions of song lyrics.

item.title: Starzは、広告なしのサブスクリプションを月額9ドルから10ドルに値上げする計画で、スタンドアロン・サービスとしては2016年のサービス開始以来初の値上げとなる（Meara Isenberg/CNET）
item.description:
Meara Isenberg / CNET:
Starz plans to increase its ad-free subscription from $9 to $10 per month, the first price increase for the standalone service since its 2016 launch  —  The change comes after the premiere of a new season of Outlander.  —  It's about to cost a bit more to stream Starz.

item.title: 分析：英国NUJの2022年の会員数は24,528人、うち給与支払いは20,722人で、2012年から21％、2004年から32％減少、高い購読料を非難する声も（Bron Maher/Press Gazette）
item.description:
Bron Maher / Press Gazette:
Analysis: membership at the UK's NUJ was 24,528 in 2022, of which 20,722 pay, down by 21% since 2012 and 32% since 2004; some blame high subscription fees  —  The journalists' union voted in April to raise membership fees by 5% this year and next.  —  Membership at the National Union …

item.title: 政治キャンペーンにおけるAI生成広告の利用が世界的に増加する中、コンサルタント、選挙研究者、議員らが新たなガードレールの設置を推進（ニューヨーク・タイムズ紙）
item.description:
New York Times:
As the use of AI-generated ads in political campaigns increases globally, consultants, election researchers, and lawmakers push for setting up new guardrails  —  Gaps in campaign rules allow politicians to spread images and messaging generated by increasingly powerful artificial intelligence technology.

item.title: K-POPとK-ドラマの人気上昇で韓国の対米直接投資はどう動いたか、BTSの2016年米国ブレイク以降、韓国の直接投資は70％以上急増（日経アジア）
item.description:
Nikkei Asia:
How the rising popularity of K-pop and K-drama drove direct South Korean investment into the US; South Korean FDI jumped 70%+ since BTS' 2016 US breakthrough  —  Music, drama fan ‘huge tailwind’ for Korean investment in states like Georgia  —  NEW YORK/PALO ALTO — In more than a decade as an auditor …

item.title: ダブリンのNewsXchange会議では、専門家が著作権侵害や誤報リスクなど、ジェネレーティブAIがジャーナリズムに与える影響について議論した（Bron Maher/Press Gazette）。
item.description:
Bron Maher / Press Gazette:
At Dublin's NewsXchange conference, experts discussed generative AI's impacts on journalism, including copyright infringement, misinformation risks, and more  —  Although there were notes of caution, most speakers were optimistic about AI and journalism.  —  It took approximately ten minutes …
